hi matt
our corporate lawyer just finished creating a summary letter and the below is the message that im sending to all investors today

Last month 2 former cofounders left the team resulting in conflicting claims and misinformation I apologize for the delay in communication as I wanted to explain the situation along with the letter from the lawyers

Over the past year Here Labs Inc has been fully funding the development of Senate However due to the absence of an IP agreement the 2 former cofounders claim ownership of the IP Senates code and design and assert that if the company doesnt buy the IP from them they can compel Senate to display the IP holders name on all user interfaces within the app

I was consulting our corporate lawyer regarding this issue and they concluded the above claims are incorrect Please have a look at a summary letter created on my behalf by our lawyers Here Labs Inc and Senate will continue to operate and please feel free to ask if you need to have a call for further questions
the kind words you gave me on the call keeps me going always appreciate your support
always sir
it seems paulo and andrei preping to release the same product soon so they are really trying their best to shut our company down
should probably consider a strategy to manage this externally beyond investors eg current customers and users they are yours to lose but also paulo may have already been reaching out to ppl
